name: Ceph Status
description: Returns `OK` if your ceph cluster status is HEALTH_OK, `WARNING` if it's HEALTH_WARNING, `CRITICAL` otherwise.

name: Ceph OSD Down
description: Returns `OK` if you have no down OSD. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph OSD Orphan
description: Returns `OK` if you have no orphan OSD. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph OSD Orphan
description: Returns `OK` if your OSDs are not full. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph OSD Near Full
description: Returns `OK` if your OSDs are not near full. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Pool Full
description: Returns `OK` if your pools have not reached their quota. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Pool Near Full
description: Returns `OK` if your pools are not near reaching their quota. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Availability
description: Returns `OK` if there is full data availability. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Degraded
description: Returns `OK` if there is full data redundancy. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Degraded Full
description: Returns `OK` if there is enough space in the cluster for data redundancy. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Damaged
description: Returns `OK` if there are no inconsistencies after data scrubing. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Not Scrubbed
description: Returns `OK` if the PGs were scrubbed recently. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph PG Not Deep Scrubbed
description: Returns `OK` if the PGs were deep scrubbed recently. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Cache Pool Near Full
description: Returns `OK` if the cache pools are not near full. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Too Few PGs
description: Returns `OK` if the number of PGs is above the min threshold. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Too Many PGs
description: Returns `OK` if the number of PGs is below the max threshold. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Object Unfound
description: Returns `OK` if all objects can be found. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Request Slow
description: Returns `OK` requests are taking a normal time to process. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.

name: Ceph Request Stuck
description: Returns `OK` requests are taking a normal time to process. Otherwise, returns `WARNING` if the severity is `HEALTH_WARN`, else `CRITICAL`.
